001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.utils;
002
003import android.util.Log;
004
005import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
006import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
007
008import com.google.gson.Gson;
009import com.google.gson.reflect.TypeToken;
010import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.json.JsonUtil;
011import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletMessage.UnknownMessage;
012import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletMessage.WalletMessage;
013import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletMessage.WalletMessageType;
014import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletMessage.credential.CredentialMessage;
015import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletMessage.pairing.PairingPayload;
016import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletMessage.pairing.PairingMessage;
017import com.squareup.moshi.JsonAdapter;
018import com.squareup.moshi.Types;
019
020import java.lang.reflect.Type;
021import java.util.Map;
022import java.util.Optional;
023
024public class WalletMessageParser {
025
026    private static final String TAG = WalletMessageParser.class.getCanonicalName();
027
028    static boolean isWalletEvent(String messageJson) {
029        return getMessageTypeFrom(messageJson) != null;
030    }
031
032    public static WalletMessage parseMessage(String messageJSON) {
033        Gson gson = new Gson();
034        switch (getMessageType(messageJSON)) {
035            case PAIRING_EVENT:
036                return gson.fromJson(messageJSON, PairingMessage.class);
037            case PAIRING_PAYLOAD:
038                return gson.fromJson(messageJSON, PairingPayload.class);
039            case CREDENTIAL_EVENT:
040                return gson.fromJson(messageJSON, CredentialMessage.class);
041            case UNKNOWN:
042                //Fallthrough
043            default:
044                return new UnknownMessage(messageJSON);
045        }
046    }
047
048    @NonNull
049    public static WalletMessageType getMessageType(String message) {
050        final WalletMessageType messageType = getMessageTypeFrom(message);
051        return messageType == null ? WalletMessageType.UNKNOWN : messageType;
052    }
053
054    @Nullable
055    public static WalletMessageType getMessageTypeFrom(String message) {
056        try {
057            final Type adapterType = Types.newParameterizedType(Map.class, String.class, WalletMessage.class);
058            final JsonAdapter<Map<String, WalletMessage>> adapter = JsonUtil.simple().moshi().adapter(adapterType);
059            final Map<String, WalletMessage> map = adapter.fromJson(message);
060            if (map == null) {
061                return null;
062            }
063
064            final String type = map.keySet().stream().findFirst().orElse(null);
065            if (type == null) {
066                return null;
067            }
068            return WalletMessageType.fromRawValue(type);
069        } catch (Exception e) {
070            Log.e(TAG, "Error reading message type: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());
071        }
072        return null;
073    }
074
075}
